chroot in 2.2.10

Apache HTTP Server 2.2.10 was released more than a week ago.

One of the new features I don’t think anyone has mentioned much is that we now have built in support for chroot.Â  Just add ChrootDir “/srv/my_root”, and all IO in Apache after the initial startup will be inside the chroot.
